remarks.para: On the object returned by the method, the method must be called exactly once for every call. Failing to end the read process before beginning another read process can cause unexpected behavior.
Note that this method always makes a call to the method under the covers.
Set the property before calling this method to specify the minimum number of bytes to buffer when reading from the stream. The value must be at least 16 KB.
